definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: The arginine transporter makes this possible.
sentences.chinese: 精氨酸載體使這一夙願成爲可能。

sentences.english: Look at the absolute figures for lysine and arginine content.
sentences.chinese: 看的賴氨酸和精氨酸含量的絕對數字。

sentences.english: The researchers achieved another breakthrough by tinkering with the form of the arginine used in their transporter.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員在精氨酸的形式方面取得另一突破。

sentences.english: Here, the most recent progresses in the methylation studies of histone arginine were summa.
sentences.chinese: 總結了組蛋白精氨酸甲基化修飾體系的最新研究進展。

sentences.english: Biochemical characterization of these enzymes showed they also exhibited both in vitro fibrinogen-clotting and arginine-esterase activities.
sentences.chinese: 兩種酶都具有精氨酸酯酶活性和纖維蛋白原凝結活性。

sentences.english: Increase your intake of L-Lysine and decrease the amount of arginine in your diet.
sentences.chinese: 在你的食譜中增加賴氨酸和減少精氨酸的攝入數量。

sentences.english: In the trepang includes and greatly arginine.
sentences.chinese: 海蔘中含有大且精氨酸。

sentences.english: Methods Arginine and indirubin in this preparation were identified by TLC.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用薄層色譜法鑑別該製劑中精氨酸和靛玉紅。

sentences.english: Arginine accumulates extensively in some plants as a soluble amino acid.
sentences.chinese: 在某些植物中，精氨酸以可溶性氨基酸大量積累。

sentences.english: L-arginine slowed down pulmonary hypertension and reconstruction of pulmonary vessels.
sentences.chinese: 精氨酸緩解了肺動脈高壓及肺血管結構重建的形成。

sentences.english: The concentration of arginine esterase was indicated as enzyme activity (U).
sentences.chinese: 精氨酸酯酶的濃度以酶活單位U表示。

sentences.english: Large amount of cystine as well as arginine lysine and ornithine are excreted in the urine.
sentences.chinese: 從患者的尿中排出大量的胱氨酸，精氨酸。

sentences.english: In chapter 3, we study the conformations and properties of arginine in the gas phase.
sentences.chinese: 第三章研究了氣相精氨酸分子的構型和性質。

sentences.english: Arginine was present in the bud only.
sentences.chinese: 精氨酸只在剛分化的芽中存在。

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
